title: Hakuou no Sono
original_name: 白桜の園 ホワイト・ガーデン
sinopse: Shirotae is a beautiful girl with some kind of past. When she transfers to Sagaouka Academy, where her uncle is the director, there is a system called the “princess system.” Shirotae is made the princess, but...?! (Source: Aerandria Scans)
